entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is the one who ties Pettigrew up with thin cords from his wand. He also helps Ron by strapping his leg up until they can get him to the hospital wing.

entities.name: pettigrew
entities.description: Pettigrew is the one who gets tied up and gagged by Lupin's wand. He transforms into a rat, but it is not specified in this text.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black threatens to kill Pettigrew if he transforms, and points his wand at Pettigrew too.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron gets hurt and Lupin helps him by strapping his leg up until they can get him to the hospital wing.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is mentioned as someone who can mend bones better than Lupin, and Ron will be taken to her for treatment.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry steps out of the way when Lupin ties Pettigrew up, and nods at Pettigrew so that he can see him agreeing with Black's threat.
